belongs_to_collection.name: Soubrettes Services : Tous les films de la série Soubrettes Services

original_title: Soubrettes Services : L'Éducation d'une Jeune Soubrette
overview: After joining the ranks of Anissa and Sharon, two magnificent, docile and experienced maids, the young Taylor discovers the unusual activities that take place in this luxurious house. In addition to her daily household chores, the young novice will have to learn - not without pleasure - to satisfy the men of the house. Starting with her perverted boss... Anissa has long been the boss' ""favourite"". She loved the privileged moments she shared with him, abandoning herself completely to his every lustful fantasy, even the most extreme.  But young Taylor's arrival will change everything...
tagline: Don't miss anything of this young maid's sexual initiation, a young woman thrown into the heart of bourgeois perversion.
title: French Maid Service: The Education of a Young Maid
